dublinCore.dc:title: 102 HR 2551 IH: To amend the Intermodal Surface Transportation Efficiency Act of 1991 to designate a portion of United States Route 74 in North Carolina as a future interstate, and for other purposes.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Edwards (for himself and Mr. McHenry) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

form.official-title: To amend the Intermodal Surface Transportation Efficiency Act of 1991 to designate a portion of United States Route 74 in North Carolina as a future interstate, and for other purposes.

subsection.text: Section 1105(c) of the Intermodal Surface Transportation Efficiency Act of 1991 (Public Law 102â€“240) is amended by adding at the end the following:

paragraph.text: United States Route 74 from Columbus, North Carolina to Kings Mountain, North Carolina.

subsection.text: Section 1105(e)(5)(A) of the Intermodal Surface Transportation Efficiency Act of 1991 is amended by striking and subsection (c)(102) and inserting subsection (c)(102), and subsection (c)(103).
